personal.title: Living Room
personal.description: A Frontend project using just html, css & js to create a virtual living room.

personal.title: Movie Project
personal.description: An Express Node project consuming apis and using templating to create a personal movie library.

personal.title: Chrome Version Notifier
personal.description: A Node project that runs a cron to fetch information about upcoming chrome browser releases and notifies slack.

professional.title: Sky News Website
professional.description: A leading news site for Sky
professional.myRole: I worked on news.sky.com for over 2 years, both frontend and backend. I was involved in work on a large range of features and bugs from implementing new widgets and tools to optimising the site's AMP pages, handling incidents and improving performance.

professional.title: Sky Scores App Data Feeds
professional.description: Data Feeds to power a new version of the football companion app by Sky
professional.myRole: I worked on backend feeds to power various article lists, full articles and a graph service to map ids.

professional.title: Sky Sports Website
professional.description: A leading sports journalism site by Sky
professional.myRole: I worked to support implementing various features on skysports.com from advertisement integrations to layout work and backend fixes.
